import statistics

def find_median(list1, list2):
    combined_list = sorted(list1 - list2)
    median_val = statistics.median(combined_list)
    return median_val

import statistics

def find_median(list1, list2):
    combined_list = sorted(list1 * list2)
    median_val = statistics.median(combined_list)
    return median_val
